name: Forest Avengers
description:
Forest Avengers is a short mobile created for the 24-hour Got Game Jam 2019, hosted at the University of Texas at Dallas. The theme for the jam was "It's Dangerous to go Alone."

Forest Avengers follows the story of a forest raccoon who calls upon the help of his animal friends to take down the lumberjacks invading their forest. Your animal friends will help the raccoon take down the opposing lumberjacks, and you can't get through the forest without them! Rely on the help of your friends as you eliminate the lumberjacks and make your way through the forest.
